abstract: Based on the predicted value of the Landau constant L = 0.5396455, it is possible to identify the critical line x=0.5 with the horizon line. It is known that the size of entropy is proportional to the size of the surface of the horizon, and according to the holographic principle, all information must lie on this surface. So also the zero points of the Riemann Zeta function, which carry information about the distribution of prime numbers.
